name: Train Simulator 2021: BR Class 31 Loco
summary: The classic Class 31 diesel locomotive was a versatile workhorse of the British railway network, and now this Brush Type 2 is available for Train Simulator 2021 in BR Railfreight Sector and preserved BR Green liveries. British Railways' 'Pilot Scheme' to replace steam traction saw 20 Type 2 diesel locomotives built by Brush Traction in 1957.
